#summary List of components contained in DKPro

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

== Coreference ==
  * !StanfordCoreferenceResolver

== Chunker ==
  * TreeTaggerChunkerTT4J

== Decompounding ==
  * !CompoundAnnotator

== Language Identification ==
  * !LangDect (Token ngram-based )
  * !TextCat

== Lemmatization ==
  * !ClearNlpLemmatizer
  * !GateLemmatizer
  * !LanguageToolLemmatizer
  * !MateLemmatizer
  * !StanfordLemmatizer
  * TreeTaggerPosLemmaTT4J

== Morphological Annotation ==
  * !MateMorphTagger

== Named Entity Recognition ==
  * !OpenNlpNameFinder
  * !StanfordNamedEntityRecognizer

== Parsing ==
  * !ClearNlpDependencyParser
  * !OpenNlpParser
  * !MaltParser
  * !MateParser
  * !MstParser
  * !StanfordParser

== POS Tagging ==
  * !ArktweetTagger
  * !ClearNlpPosTagger
  * !LbjPosTagger
  * !MatePosTagger
  * !MeCabTagger
  * !OpenNlpPosTagger
  * !StanfordPosTagger
  * TreeTaggerPosLemmaTT4J

== Segmentation / Tokenization ==
  * !ClearNlpSegmenter
  * !BreakIteratorSegmenter
  * !LanguageToolSegmenter
  * !OpenNlpSegmenter
  * !StanfordSegmenter

== Semantic Role Labelling ==
  * !ClearNlpSemanticRoleLabeler

== Spell Checking ==
  * !LanguageToolChecker
  * !NorvigSpellingCorrector
  * !SpellChecker (Jazzy)

== Stemming ==
  * !MorphaStemmer
  * !SnowballStemmer
